staff.created: A new Staff is created with identifier {{ param }}
staff.updated: A Staff is updated with identifier {{ param }}
staff.deleted: A Staff is deleted with identifier {{ param }}

delete.question: Are you sure you want to delete Staff {{ id }}?

staff.name: Name

help.employeeID: The unique employee number assigned by the company or payroll system.
help.startDate: When the person started at the organisation. This is used by some LeaveEntitlement calculations.
help.endDate: When employment ended. If set, it indicates a person is an active employee anymore.
help.name: A read-only field consisting out of the first name and last name of the person.
help.contractNumber: Preferably the cellphone number. This can be used for sending messages to the person.
help.annualLeaveEntitlement:
The number of annual leave days an employee is entitled to according to there employment contract,
This should be populated using {@link EntitlementValue} table according to the linked user
